page.title: 15MILTON CREEK
page.content: The creek is round about two miles long.There is very little traffic on the creek now.Silt at the bottom of the creek makes it smell.The creek is very dirty because it is not used so it stagnates and the chemicals from Bowaters make it smell.In the creek there is mostly mud and in the mud there are mud fish. {Milton creek rescue operation trust was set up on June 5th 1985.They plan to clear the creek of rubbish using voluntary organisations if possible, consult land owners and local groups such as the Medway port authority about possible developments, especially for recreational purposes and perhaps for commercial use {Dolphin Barge Museum}which shows the history of the barges and the creek, opens on Bank holidays and on Sundays.
